attributes.action: Ensure that the policy of new Free schools is kept to.
attributes.additional_details:
I belive the policy of free schools should be kept because they are doing what schools should already be doing but what many are not.

1. Thay are not not privatising education but using charities to run them,
2. They ask for higher academic standards than many other state schoools because parents are involved.
3.
They do not not bar any student from going. It is like any other school.
4. They have competitive sport.
5. If existing schools were already like this, free schools would not be as threatening to them.
